response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe is worth every bit of its $8,000 value to you. Given its exceptional quality and the unique benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. If you decide to proceed with the purchase, I am willing to sell it to you for $7,500. This represents a special discount tailored to recognize your interest and commitment. Please let me know if this offer suits your expectations and budget. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 7500}
